item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 24, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: We made an MCP Server so that Cursor can build anything from API Docs (48 points | 13 comments)
2. Millions are visiting the European Alternatives site. What trends are we seeing? (312 points | 214 comments)
3. European Cloud, Global Reach (168 points | 101 comments)
4. Did you spot a fish? Press the Fish Doorbell (61 points | 16 comments)

8. Langfuse (YC W23) Is Hiring in Berlin, Germany ( | hide)

10. RDNA 4's “Out-of-Order” Memory Accesses (147 points | 11 comments)

13. Building and Publishing Games to Steam Directly from GitHub Actions (35 points | 12 comments)

20. 23andMe files for bankruptcy to sell itself (308 points | 237 comments)

22. The Mystery of the Oldest Writing System Remained Unsolved Until 1856 (22 points | discuss)
23. Supply Chain Attacks on Linux Distributions – Fedora Pagure (153 points | 41 comments)

25. Play the Virtual Organ from Arp Schnitger (100 points | 19 comments)

28. BeeFormer: CF and CBF hybrid approach for recommendation systems (21 points | discuss)
29. LangManus: An Open-Source Manus Agent with LangChain + LangGraph (70 points | 8 comments)
30. Total lunar eclipse over Teide crater, Tenerife – a project with many obstacles (120 points | 7 comments)
